_comment: Created by NCODowd on 13/09/2016 11:07:19 using v2.7
title: What are patients' overall experiences of out-of-hours GP services?
analysis_commentary:
The majority of patients are also happy with their overall experiences of out-of-hours GP services, but to a lesser extent than their overall experience of GP surgeries. Of the patients who responded in 2014/2015, 69% said their experiences of out-of-hours GP services were very and fairly good. This is an improvement on 2013/14 but lower than the precentage recorded in 2011/12 and 2012/13.

Updated August 2016.
